snippet: Russia extended its military presence in Tajikistan for 30 years on Friday, signing an agreement prolonging its lease on a military base there until 2042.
abstract: Russia and Tajikistan reach agreement to keep Russian military base in Tajikistan until 2042.
lead_paragraph: Russia extended its military presence in Tajikistan for 30 years on Friday, signing an agreement prolonging its lease on a military base there until 2042.
